author: Stereogum
title: Watch Papa John Murphy Try To Adjust To A Morning Show Interview
text: Father John Misty's endless parade of interviews to promote his forthcoming album Pure Comedy continues. He recently went on BBC One's Breakfast morning talk show, and the most surprising thing about it is just how normal it is. He's sarcastic and willfully obtuse throughout, sure, but when he doesn't have a … More »
